sqlMap.select: SELECT /* TXMC0170.SEARCH00.부가세전자신고(인적사항)조회 */ A.BRANCH_CD /*VAT_지점코드*/ , A.BIZ_NO /*VAT_사업자번호*/ , A.BRANCH_NM /*VAT_지점명*/ , A.CORP_NO /*VAT_법인번호*/ , A.CORP_NM /*VAT_법인명*/ , A.CORP_TYPENM /*VAT_업태명*/ , A.CORP_LINE /*VAT_종목명*/ , A.CORP_MASTER /*VAT_대표자명*/ , A.CORP_ADDR /*VAT_사업자주소*/ , A.CORP_TEL /*VAT_사업장전화번호*/ , A.CORP_CELL /*VAT_사업자휴대전화*/ , A.TAXOFFICE_CD /*VAT_관할세무서코드*/ , A.HOMETAX_ID /*VAT_홈택스ID*/ , A.CORP_POST /*VAT_우편번호*/ FROM VA_VATBRANCH A WHERE A.BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN#

SELECT /* TXMC0170.SEARCH01.부가세전자신고(1PAGE) 조회 */ BRANCH_CD /*지점코드 */ , VAT_YYYY /*VAT년도 */ , VAT_QUARTER /*VAT분기 */ , VAT_SYMD /*과세기간_시작일 */ , VAT_EYMD /*과세기간_종료일 */ , VAT_CYMD /*작성일자 */ , USER_ID /*사용자아이디 */ , CORP_NO /*법인번호 */ , CORP_CELL /*사업자휴대전화 */ , CORP_EMAIL /*전자메일주소 */ , CORP_NM /*법인명 */ , CORP_MASTER /*대표자명 */ , CORP_LOCATION /*사업장소재지 */ , CORP_TEL /*사업장전화번호 */ , CORP_ADDR /*사업자주소 */ , CORP_TYPENM /*업태명 */ , CORP_LINE /*종목명 */ , CORP_TYPECD /*업종코드 */ , CORP_SYMD /*개업년월일 */ , AGENT_NM /*세무대리인성명 */ , AGENT_NO /*세무대리인관리번호 */ , AGENT_TEL /*세무대리인전화번호 */ , AGENT_BIZNO /*세무대리인사업자번호 */ , REVISION_TYPECD /*보정신고구분 */ , SH_TAXBIL_SAMT /*과표신고과세세금계산서금액 */ , SH_TAXBIL_VAMT /*과표신고과세세금계산서세액 */ , SH_PURPUB_SAMT /*과표신고과세매입자발행금액 */ , SH_PURPUB_VAMT /*과표신고과세매입자발행세액 */ , SH_CRECAS_SAMT /*과표신고신용카드현금영수증금액 */ , SH_CRECAS_VAMT /*과표신고신용카드현금영수증세액 */ , SH_TAXETC_SAMT /*과표신고과세기타금액 */ , SH_TAXETC_VAMT /*과표신고과세기타세액 */ , SH_ZERBIL_SAMT /*과표신고영세세금계산서금액 */ , SH_ZERETC_SAMT /*과표신고영세기타금액 */ , SH_WILMIS_SAMT /*과표예정신고누락분금액 */ , SH_WILMIS_VAMT /*과표예정신고누락분세액 */ , SH_DOUADD_SAMT /*대손세액가감금액 */ , SH_DOUADD_VAMT /*대손세액가감세액 */ , SALTOT_SAMT /*과세표준 */ , SALTOT_VAMT /*산출세액 */ , PH_TAXBIL_SAMT /*매입수취일반금액 */ , PH_TAXBIL_VAMT /*매입수취일반세액 */ , PH_ASSETS_SAMT /*매입수취고정잔산금액 */ , PH_ASSETS_VAMT /*매입수취고정자산세액 */ , PH_WILTOT_SAMT /*매입예정신고누락금액 */ , PH_WILTOT_VAMT /*매입예정신고누락세액 */ , PH_PURPUB_SAMT /*매입매입자발행금액 */ , PH_PURPUB_VAMT /*매입매입자발행세액 */ , PH_ETCBIL_SAMT /*매입기타공제금액 */ , PH_ETCBIL_VAMT /*매입기타공제세액 */ , PH_PTOTAL_SAMT /*매입금액합계 */ , PH_PTOTAL_VAMT /*매입세액합계 */ , PH_UNABLE_SAMT /*매입공제받지못할금액 */ , PH_UNABLE_VAMT /*매입공제받지못할세액 */ , PH_ADDMIN_SAMT /*차감매입금액 */ , PH_ADDMIN_VAMT /*차감매입세액 */ , SP_RETURN_VAMT /*납부및환급세액 */ , RH_ETCMIN_VAMT /*기타공제_경감세액 */ , RH_CREDIT_SAMT /*금전신용공제금액 */ , RH_CREDIT_VAMT /*금전신용공제세액 */ , RH_MINTOT_VAMT /*경감세액계 */ , RH_WILRET_VAMT /*예정미환급세액 */ , RH_NOTRET_VAMT /*예정고지세액 */ , RH_PROHIB_VAMT /*금지금매입자납부특례기납부세액 */ , RH_ADDTOT_VAMT /*가산세계 */ , VAT_REF_VAMT /*차감납부할세액 */ , IH_EXCEPT_SAMT /*과세수입금액제외금액 */ , IH_TAXBIL_SAMT /*과세수입금액합계 */ /* PH_EXPOST_VAMT 수출기업 */ FROM TA_VAT101_H1 WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#

SELECT /* TXMC0170.SEARCH02.부가세전자신고(2PAGE) 조회 */ BRANCH_CD /*지점코드 */ , VAT_YYYY /*VAT년도 */ , VAT_QUARTER /*VAT분기 */ , SW_TAXBIL_SAMT /*과표예정과세세금계산서금액 */ , SW_TAXBIL_VAMT /*과표예정과세세금계산서세액 */ , SW_TAXETC_SAMT /*과표예정과세기타금액 */ , SW_TAXETC_VAMT /*과표예정과세기타세액 */ , SW_ZERBIL_SAMT /*과표예정영세세금계산서금액 */ , SW_ZERETC_SAMT /*과표예정영세기타금액 */ , SW_SALTOT_SAMT /*과표예정신고누락분금액합계 */ , SW_SALTOT_VAMT /*과표예정신고누락분세액합계 */ , PW_TAXBIL_SAMT /*예정매입세금계산서누락금액 */ , PW_TAXBIL_VAMT /*예정매입세금계산서누락세액 */ , PW_ETCBIL_SAMT /*예정매입기타공제누락세액금액 */ , PW_ETCBIL_VAMT /*예정매입기타공제누락세액세액 */ , PW_PURTOT_SAMT /*예정매입누락합계금액 */ , PW_PURTOT_VAMT /*예정매입누락합계세액 */ , PD_CREDIT_SAMT /*매입금전신용금액 */ , PD_CREDIT_VAMT /*매입금전신용세액 */ , PD_AGENDA_SAMT /*매입의제매입금액 */ , PD_AGENDA_VAMT /*매입의제매입세액 */ , PD_RECYCL_SAMT /*매입재활용금액 */ , PD_RECYCL_VAMT /*매입재활용세액 */ , PD_CONVER_VAMT /*과세사업전환매입세액 */ , PD_ALAGEN_SAMT /*매입고금의제매입금액 */ , PD_ALAGEN_VAMT /*매입고금의제매입세액 */ , PD_ASSETS_SAMT /*매입신용고정자산금액 */ , PD_ASSETS_VAMT /*매입신용고정자산세액 */ , PD_STOCKP_VAMT /*매입재고매입세액 */ , PD_BADDEP_VAMT /*매입변제대손세액 */ , PD_PURTOT_SAMT /*기타공제매입금액합계 */ , PD_PURTOT_VAMT /*기타공제매입세액합계 */ , PN_UNABLE_SAMT /*불공제매입금액 */ , PN_UNABLE_VAMT /*불공제매입세액 */ , PN_EXCEPT_SAMT /*공통매입면세사업금액 */ , PN_EXCEPT_VAMT /*공통매입면세사업세액 */ , PN_DOUADD_SAMT /*대손처분금액 */ , PN_DOUADD_VAMT /*대손처분세액 */ , PN_PURTOT_SAMT /*매입공제받지못할금액합계 */ , PN_PURTOT_VAMT /*매입공제받지못할세액합계 */ , RD_EBIPAY_VAMT /*전자신고공제세액 */ , RD_EBITAX_VAMT /*전자세금계산서발급세액공제세액 */ , RD_TAXICO_VAMT /*택시사업부가가치세경감세액 */ , RD_CASBIL_VAMT /*현금영수증사업자공제세액 */ , RD_ETCBIL_VAMT /*기타경감공제세액명세기타세액 */ , AD_BIZMIS_SAMT /*사업자등록가산금액 */ , AD_BIZMIS_VAMT /*사업자등록가산세 */ , AD_EBIDEL_SAMT /*세금계산서지연발급등가산금액 */ , AD_EBIDEL_VAMT /*세금계산서지연발급등가산세액 */ , AD_NOTPUB_SAMT /*세금계산서미발급등가산금액 */ , AD_NOTPUB_VAMT /*세금계산서미발급등가산세액 */ , AD_EBIOVE_SAMT /*전자세금계산서발급명세전송-지연전송금액*/ , AD_EBIOVE_VAMT /*전자세금계산서발급명세전송-지연전송세액*/ , AD_EBIEXC_SAMT /*전자세금계산서발급명세전송-미전송세액 */ , AD_EBIEXC_VAMT /*전자세금계산서발급명세전송-미전송세액 */ , AD_TAXBIL_SAMT /*세금계산서합계표 제출불성실금액 */ , AD_TAXBIL_VAMT /*세금계산서합계표 제출불성실세액 */ , AD_REPORT_SAMT /*신고불성실-합계금액 */ , AD_REPORT_VAMT /*신고불성실-합계세액 */ , AD_NOSEND_SAMT /*납부불성실가산금액 */ , AD_NOSEND_VAMT /*납부불성실가산세액 */ , AD_ZERBIL_SAMT /*영세율신고가산금액 */ , AD_ZERBIL_VAMT /*영세율신고가산세액 */ , AD_CASNOT_SAMT /*현금매출명세서미제출등가산금액 */ , AD_CASNOT_VAMT /*현금매출명세서미제출등가산세액 */ , AD_ADDTOT_VAMT /*가산세세액계 */ , DF_EXCEPT_SAMT /*면세수입금액제외금액 */ , DF_TAXBIL_SAMT /*면세수입금액합계 */ , BD_SALTOT_SAMT /*계산서발급금액 */ , BD_PURTOT_SAMT /*계산서수취금액 */ , REFUND_TYPECD /*환급구분 */ , VAT_BANKCD /*국세환급금은행코드 */ , VAT_BANKNO /*국세환급금계좌번호 */ , VAT_TOTPAYNO /*총괄납부승인번호 */ , VAT_BANKBRANCH /*은행지점명 */ , CORP_EYMD /*폐업일자 */ , CLOSING_REMARK /*폐업사유 */ , VAT_REF_VAMT /*실차감납부할세액 */ , VAT_NTAX_TYPECD /*일반과세자구분 */ , VAT_EARLY_TYPECD /*조기환급취소구분 */ , CORP_TYPENM /*업태명 */ , CORP_LINE /*종목명 */ , CORP_TYPECD /*업종코드 */ , BRANCH_APPRNO /*사업자단위과세승인번호 */ , AD_TAXDEL_SAMT /*세금계산서합계표 지연제출금액 */ , AD_TAXDEL_VAMT /*세금계산서합계표 지연제출세액 */ , AD_REPOR1_SAMT /*신고불성실-무신고(일반)금액 */ , AD_REPOR1_VAMT /*신고불성실-무신고(일반)세액 */ , AD_REPOR2_SAMT /*신고불성실-무신고(부당)금액 */ , AD_REPOR2_VAMT /*신고불성실-무신고(부당)세액 */ , AD_REPOR3_SAMT /*과소·초과환급신고(일반)금액 */ , AD_REPOR3_VAMT /*과소·초과환급신고(일반)세액 */ , AD_REPOR4_SAMT /*과소·초과환급신고(부당)금액 */ , AD_REPOR4_VAMT /*과소·초과환급신고(부당)세액 */ , AD_ESTATE_SAMT /*부동산임대공급가액명세서 불성실금액 */ , AD_ESTATE_VAMT /*부동산임대공급가액명세서 불성실세액 */ , AD_EBDERV_SAMT /*세금계산서지연수취가산금액 */ , AD_EBDERV_VAMT /*세금계산서지연수취가산세액 */ FROM TA_VAT101_H2 WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#

SELECT /* TXMC0170.SEARCH03.부가세전자신고(과세표준명세, 면세수입금액) 조회 */ /*부가가치세수입금액등(과세표준명세)*/ INCOME_SEQ , BRANCH_CD , VAT_YYYY , VAT_QUARTER , INCOME_TYPECD , CORP_TYPENM , CORP_LINE , CORP_TYPECD , INCOME_SAMT FROM TA_VAT101_D WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER# AND ( INCOME_TYPECD = 1 OR (INCOME_TYPECD <> 1 AND INCOME_SAMT <> 0) ) UNION ALL /*경감세액공제*/ SELECT TO_NCHAR('') AS INCOME_SEQ , BRANCH_CD , VAT_YYYY , VAT_QUARTER , TO_NCHAR('7') AS INCOME_TYPECD , CORP_TYPENM , CORP_LINE , CORP_TYPECD , RH_ETCMIN_VAMT FROM TA_VAT101_H1 WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER# AND RH_ETCMIN_VAMT <> 0 UNION ALL /*면세 수입금액 합계*/ SELECT TO_NCHAR('') AS INCOME_SEQ , BRANCH_CD , VAT_YYYY , VAT_QUARTER , TO_NCHAR('8') AS INCOME_TYPECD , CORP_TYPENM , CORP_LINE , CORP_TYPECD , DF_TAXBIL_SAMT FROM TA_VAT101_H2 WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER# AND DF_TAXBIL_SAMT <> 0 UNION ALL /*면세 수입금액 제외금액*/ SELECT TO_NCHAR('') AS INCOME_SEQ , BRANCH_CD , VAT_YYYY , VAT_QUARTER , TO_NCHAR('E') AS INCOME_TYPECD , CORP_TYPENM , CORP_LINE , CORP_TYPECD , DF_EXCEPT_SAMT FROM TA_VAT101_H2 WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER# AND DF_EXCEPT_SAMT <> 0

SELECT /* TXMC0170.SEARCH_V101_D2.부가가치세 공제감면 신고서 레코드 조회 *//*신용카드매출전표수취명세서제출분-일반*/ '211' AS DEDUCT_TYPECD /*공제감면코드*/ , '1' AS REGIST_NO /*등록일련번호*/ , VAT_QUARTER , PD_CREDIT_SAMT AS DEDUCT_SAMT /*공제감면금액*/ , PD_CREDIT_VAMT AS DEDUCT_VAMT /*공제감면세액*/ FROM TA_VAT101_H2 /* [부가가치세_헤더_2쪽] */ WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER# AND PD_CREDIT_VAMT <> 0 UNION ALL /*신용카드매출전표수취명세서제출분-고정자산*/ SELECT '212' AS DEDUCT_TYPECD /*공제감면코드*/ , '1' AS REGIST_NO /*등록일련번호*/ , VAT_QUARTER , PD_ASSETS_SAMT AS DEDUCT_SAMT /*공제감면금액*/ , PD_ASSETS_VAMT AS DEDUCT_VAMT /*공제감면세액*/ FROM TA_VAT101_H2 /* [부가가치세_헤더_2쪽] */ WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER# AND PD_ASSETS_VAMT <> 0 UNION ALL /*의제매입세액*/ SELECT '230' AS DEDUCT_TYPECD /*공제감면코드*/ , '1' AS REGIST_NO /*등록일련번호*/ , VAT_QUARTER , PD_AGENDA_SAMT AS DEDUCT_SAMT /*공제감면금액*/ , PD_AGENDA_VAMT AS DEDUCT_VAMT /*공제감면세액*/ FROM TA_VAT101_H2 /* [부가가치세_헤더_2쪽] */ WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER# AND PD_AGENDA_VAMT <> 0 UNION ALL /*재활용폐자원 등 매입세액*/ SELECT '270' AS DEDUCT_TYPECD /*공제감면코드*/ , '1' AS REGIST_NO /*등록일련번호*/ , VAT_QUARTER , PD_RECYCL_SAMT AS DEDUCT_SAMT /*공제감면금액*/ , PD_RECYCL_VAMT AS DEDUCT_VAMT /*공제감면세액*/ FROM TA_VAT101_H2 /* [부가가치세_헤더_2쪽] */ WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER# AND PD_RECYCL_VAMT <> 0 UNION ALL /*과세사업전환매입세액*/ SELECT '291' AS DEDUCT_TYPECD /*공제감면코드*/ , '1' AS REGIST_NO /*등록일련번호*/ , VAT_QUARTER , 0 AS DEDUCT_SAMT /*공제감면금액*/ , PD_CONVER_VAMT AS DEDUCT_VAMT /*공제감면세액*/ FROM TA_VAT101_H2 /* [부가가치세_헤더_2쪽] */ WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER# AND PD_CONVER_VAMT <> 0 UNION ALL /*재고매입세액*/ SELECT '292' AS DEDUCT_TYPECD /*공제감면코드*/ , '1' AS REGIST_NO /*등록일련번호*/ , VAT_QUARTER , 0 AS DEDUCT_SAMT /*공제감면금액*/ , PD_STOCKP_VAMT AS DEDUCT_VAMT /*공제감면세액*/ FROM TA_VAT101_H2 /* [부가가치세_헤더_2쪽] */ WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER# AND PD_STOCKP_VAMT <> 0 UNION ALL /*변제대손세액*/ SELECT '293' AS DEDUCT_TYPECD SELECT /* TXMC0170.SEARCH04.부가세전자신고(기타신고서 여부) 조회 */ (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT101_H1 WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V101 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT104_H WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V104 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT105_H WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V105 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT106_D WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V106 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT109_H WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V109 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT110_H WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V110 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT112_D WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V112 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT117_H WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V117 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT141_H WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V141 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT149_H WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V149 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT153_H WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V153 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT164_D WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V164 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT166_H WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V166 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT171_H WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V171 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT120_H WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V120 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(0) >= 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END FROM TA_VAT177_H WHERE BRANCH_CD = #ACCT_GUBN# AND VAT_YYYY = #VAT_YYYY# AND VAT_QUARTER = #VAT_QUARTER#) AS VAT_V177 FROM DUAL
